category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ITEM_id_unregister_on_delete
preference.preference_description: Determines if item IDs are automatically unregistered when items are deleted or the item ID is changed. Valid Values: TRUE - Automatically removes item IDs from the item ID registry when items are deleted or the item ID is changed. FALSE - Does not remove item IDs to the item ID registry when items are deleted or the item ID is changed.
